FulfillmentOrderItemTax.name: FulfillmentOrderItemTax
FulfillmentOrderItemTax.description: Represents the tax on a FulfillmentOrderLineItem or FulfillmentOrderItemAdjustment. Corresponds to an OrderItemTaxLineItemSummary.

Amount.description: Amount of tax represented by the FulfillmentOrderItemTax.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: ISO code for the currency of the FulfillmentOrderLineItem to which the tax applies. The default value is USD.

FulfillmentOrder​ItemAdjustId.description: If this object represents tax on an adjustment, this value is the ID of the FulfillmentOrderItemAdjustment to which the tax applies. If this value is null, the adjustment applies to a FulfillmentOrderLineItem.

FulfillmentOrder​LineItemId.description: If this object represents tax on a FulfillmentOrderLineItem, this value is the ID of that FulfillmentOrderLineItem. If this object represents tax on an adjustment, this value is the ID of the FulfillmentOrderLineItem to which the adjustment applies.

OrderItemTaxLineItem​SummaryId.description: ID of the OrderItemTaxLineItemSummary associated with the OrderItemSummary that corresponds to the FulfillmentOrderLineItem to which the tax applies.

Rate.description: Tax rate used to calculate the Amount.

TaxEffectiveDate.description: Date on which the Amount was calculated. Important due to tax rate changes over time.

Type.description: Indicates whether the Amount is actual or estimated.
